character.statement: You there! Newcomer! Step lightly. There are evil doings afoot.
Someone stole my pants!
You'll need to be more than that. Since you're new around here, you're the only person I can trust. Will you help me collar the criminal?
Great. We'll have to split up, but I'll leave pages from my detective log around town to help you out.
To start with, you may want to investigate my former business partner. His loyalty is in question.
You can usually find him lounging at my house, waiting for someone to leave food unguarded.
Oh, come on. Don't draw attention to it.
Such as?
I'll... be careful, I guess.
Far be it from me to stand idly by while a pants thief terrorizes this fair city.
Oh! I didn't realize you meant the pants you were wearing!
The door is locked.
Boo!
Ooga Booga!
After those pants!
What kind of turkey parks in the middle of the street like this?
I can only deliver this to Corrina Corrina.
Anyone there? I've got that surveillance equipment you ordered, Corrina Corrina.
Yipes! Hey, that wasn't nice. You could have really startled me if you weren't so goofy looking.
Anyway, beat it. I can only deliver this to Corrina Corrina.
Yeeaaarrgh! A monster!
